trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a <see cref="Overload:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send" /> or <see cref="Overload:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync" /> method calls a method that throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="Overload:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send" /> 或 <see cref="Overload:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync" /> 方法调用的方法引发异常时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> class throws this exception to indicate that while sending an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) Echo request, a method called by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> class threw an unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>类会引发此异常以指示时发送 Internet 控制消息协议 (ICMP) 回显请求，方法调用<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>类引发了未经处理的异常。

trans-unit.source: Applications should check the inner exception of a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException> object to identify the problem.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序应检查内部异常，<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException>对象以确定问题。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> class does not throw this exception if the ICMP Echo request fails because of network, ICMP, or destination errors.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>类不会引发此异常，如果 ICMP 回显请求将因网络、 ICMP 或目标错误而失败。

trans-unit.source: For such errors, the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> class returns a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply> object with the relevant <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus> value set in the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 对于此类错误，<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>类返回<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply>具有相关对象<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>值设置为<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the error.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException" /> class using the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property with the text in the `message` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>属性中的文本`message`参数。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that specifies the contextual information about the source or destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />，指定有关此序列化的源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute a previously serialized <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException> object.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化，以便重建以前序列化过程中调用<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException>对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the error.
The exception that causes the current exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException" /> class using the specified message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的消息和内部异常初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property with the text in the `message` parameter, and the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property with the `innerException` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>属性中的文本`message`参数，与<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>具有属性`innerException`参数。
